channel.description: Recent content in medium_box on d4rkn1gh7 | Tech Blog

item.title: Inferno TryHackMe Writeup
item.description: Inferno TryHackMe Writeup Room link : https://tryhackme.com/room/inferno Pathway In this room first we bruteforce http login , then we find a public rce exploit and gain foothold and then with the help of a hidden file we gain user acccess. Then with sudo rights we gain root access. First Stage : Enumeration Let’s start with nmap scan. # Nmap 7.91 scan initiated Fri Feb 19 21:53:19 2021 as: nmap -sC -sV -T4 -vv -p- -oN nmapscan 10.

item.title: Enpass TryHackMe Writeup
item.description: Enpass TryHackMe Writeup Summary In this box first we get the ssh private key through directory bruteforcing , then the password for decrypting it by understanding php code and creating a string . Then bypassing a forbidden page and getting username . Then using a cronjob to gain root. First Stage : Enumeration I started as usual with nmap scan. # Nmap 7.91 scan initiated Thu Feb 11 19:33:13 2021 as: nmap -sC -sV -T4 -vv -p- -oN nmapscan 10.

item.title: Madeye's Castle TryHackMe Writeup
item.description: Madeye’s Castle TryHackMe Writeup This room made me learn many things through the process, including sql injection , vulnerability in rand() function and also regex !. I highly recommend doing SQL Injection Lab before doing this as it starts from basics and explains very well . It has some very good challenges which will be useful in any rooms involving sqli. First Stage : Enumeration So let’s start with nmap

item.title: Sustah TryHackMe Writeup
item.description: Sustah TryHackMe Wirteup First Stage : Enumeration So as usual let’s fire up nmap. # Nmap 7.91 scan initiated Sat Jan 30 13:48:26 2021 as: nmap -sC -sV -T4 -vv -p- -oN nmapscan 10.10.95.49 Warning: 10.10.95.49 giving up on port because retransmission cap hit (6). Nmap scan report for 10.10.95.49 Host is up, received syn-ack (0.16s latency). Scanned at 2021-01-30 13:48:27 IST for 877s Not shown: 65531 closed ports Reason: 65531 conn-refused PORT STATE SERVICE REASON VERSION 22/tcp open ssh syn-ack OpenSSH 7.

item.title: Battery TryHackMe Writeup
item.description: Battery TryHackMe Writeup First Stage : Enumeration. Note : this is one of the ways to do this room. Try your own way and root it ! Let’s start with nmap # Nmap 7.91 scan initiated Sat Jan 16 14:40:15 2021 as: nmap -sC -sV -T4 -vv -p- -oN nmapscan 10.10.132.103 Nmap scan report for 10.10.132.103 Host is up, received conn-refused (0.15s latency). Scanned at 2021-01-16 14:40:16 IST for 741s Not shown: 65533 closed ports Reason: 65533 conn-refused PORT STATE SERVICE REASON VERSION 22/tcp open ssh syn-ack OpenSSH 6.

item.title: Overpass3 TryHackMe Writeup
item.description: OverPass 3 Writeup First Stage : Enumeration So lets start with nmap scan. # Nmap 7.91 scan initiated Mon Jan 11 10:50:45 2021 as: nmap -sC -sV -T4 -vv -p- -oN nmapscan 10.10.122.209 Nmap scan report for 10.10.122.209 Host is up, received syn-ack (0.15s latency). Scanned at 2021-01-11 10:50:45 IST for 187s Not shown: 65532 filtered ports Reason: 65364 no-responses and 168 host-unreaches PORT STATE SERVICE REASON VERSION 21/tcp open ftp syn-ack vsftpd 3.

item.title: Unbaked Pie TryHackMe Writeup
item.description: Unbaked_Pie Writeup First Stage : Enumeration So let’s start with a nmap scan. # Nmap 7.91 scan initiated Fri Dec 11 11:56:00 2020 as: nmap -sC -T4 -vv -p- -oN nmapscan -Pn 10.10.44.92 Nmap scan report for 10.10.44.92 Host is up, received user-set (0.16s latency). Scanned at 2020-12-11 11:56:08 IST for 362s Not shown: 65534 filtered ports Reason: 65534 no-responses PORT STATE SERVICE REASON 5003/tcp open filemaker syn-ack Read data files from: /usr/bin/.
